Name: DREAM GIRLS VR
About the game: DREAM GIRLS VR is experience, meet all girls, play with them at the party in show room... You can choose one of locations, and admire their beautiful movement in the dance. During experience you can control the time. Slow down the animation or stop it absolutely. Experience amazing moments in Virtual Reality using HTC Vive or Oculus Rift! Locations: - Tropical Island - Office - Bedroom - Red room - Show room Features: - Girls - Slow down or stop animation - Unique music - Different types of dance - Game designed for HTC VIVE or OCULUS RIFT - and many more...
